doc.name: PushSupplier
doc.description: An actor that send data to a remote consumer. Specify the ORB initial property with theORBInitProperties paremerter, for example: "-ORBInitialHost xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu -ORBInitialPort 1050" where "xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu" is the machine runing name server, and "1050" is the port for name service. Specify the name of the consumer with ConsumerName that it wants to send data to.
doc.author: Yang Zhao
doc.property: the ORB initial property. for example: "-ORBInitialHost xyz.eecs.berkeley.edu -ORBInitialPort 1050"
The name of the remote consumer that this actor wants to connect to. The type of the Parameter is StringToken.
